item.title: About Us
item.description: Hello! We are a married couple who games together as a hobby and believe there should be more wholesome, cozy spaces on the internet, where people can come together, online and off, to create positive experiences. We were raised on Nintendo and Sega, back when you sat down with your friends or a sibling in front of the spare tv and spent hours together exploring 8-bit imaginary worlds and the little pixel characters tasked with saving them.
